about_the_game:
Officer graphics for Zhou Yu will be added.
We will use the battle of Chibi as a motif.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Zhou Yu. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the Zhou Yu Bonus Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
detailed_description:
Officer graphics for Zhou Yu will be added.
We will use the battle of Chibi as a motif.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Zhou Yu. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the Zhou Yu Bonus Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
